subject: How to unit test Eclipse Plugin and RCP?
msgSnippet: hi, all Could anyone make some suggestions of how to unit test Eclipse Plugin, especially RCP application? There are any strategies, tips, or tools in your
messageBody:
hi, all

especially RCP application? There are any strategies, tips, or tools
